module.name: yotpo
module.description: Yotpo's FREE reviews add-on will help your shop generate significantly more reviews, present them beautifully on your shop, and share them on your (and your customers') social networks
module.description_full: Yotpo's FREE reviews add-on will help your shop generate significantly more reviews, present them beautifully on your shop, and share them on your (and your customers') social networks. They're loved by tens of thousands of store owners for a reason!﻿

module.name: gamification
module.description: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!

module.author: Prestashop

module.name: firstdata
module.description: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿! Fast. Secure. Reliable
module.description_full: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿! Fast. Secure. Reliable. PrestaShop and First Data have teamed up as industry leaders to help your business save money in online payment acceptance. With over 40 years of payment processing experience, Express Merchant Processing Solutions (EMPS) — powered by First Data has helped millions of businesses like yours bring fast, secure, effortless payments to their customers and affordable support—regardless of size.﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: zingaya
module.description: Capture and Convert Customers! Zingaya enables voice calls through any computer, right from a webpage
module.description_full: Capture and Convert Customers! Zingaya enables voice calls through any computer, right from a webpage. No download or phone is required!﻿ Zingaya offers this seamless voice calling capability to website operators – whether it's a huge e-commerce enterprise or a startup company. Within minutes you can simply create and embed a Call button into your website. Visitors can click the Call button and be immediately forwarded to your call center, landline, mobile phone or voicemail. All you need is a website; all your visitors need is a browser and microphone. It's that easy!﻿ Get started in just a few clicks!﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: paypalusa
module.description: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly
module.description_full: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly.﻿ Get started by setting up a PayPal Business account. Sign up now!﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: prediggo
module.description: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter
module.description_full: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter. ﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: browsi
module.description: Increase customer engagement, drive more traffic and sell more on mobile! Brow.si powers engaging mobile shopping experiences
module.description_full: Increase customer engagement, drive more traffic and sell more on mobile! Brow.si powers engaging mobile shopping experiences. This free module developed for PrestaShop seamlessly adds powerful features to your online store when accessed from a mobile device to help your customers easily search, discover, share and purchase your products wherever they are on your site. Get Brow.si on your site - it's free!
module.additional_description: While it’s no secret that more and more consumers use their mobile phones to discover and purchase products online, the mobile web browsing experience is broken and inconsistent, resulting in customer frustration, lack of engagement and loss of revenues for you the merchant. Brow.si fixes the broken mobile web by making key elements of the mobile browsing experience clear, consistent and useful for consumers. This results in more people taking action with respect to your brand, content and products.﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: shopgate
module.description: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugi
module.description_full: Shopgate allows you to get a mobile site for your store as well as iOS and Android Apps! Our solution is recommended by PrestaShop as it is perfectly integrated with your system through a simple plugin. Integrating your shop takes a few hours with no investment! Benefit now from PrestaShop special offer to create your account! For the US.For the UK.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: bluepay
module.description: The BluePay module supports both credit card and ACH transactions with optional saved payments. Payments can be processed through either the standard hosted page or iframe
module.description_full: The BluePay module supports both credit card and ACH transactions with optional saved payments. Payments can be processed through either the standard hosted page or iframe.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: incentivibe
module.description: Virally grow email subscribers & fans by offering your visitors $500 prizes for only $25
module.description_full: Virally grow email subscribers & fans by offering your visitors $500 prizes for only $25. How? Incentivibe groups businesses so you can offer $500 prize on your website by sharing a fraction of prize cost (e.g. $25) with other businesses.
module.additional_description: Virally grow email subscribers and fans with $500 prizes for $25 (14-DAY FREE TRIAL)﻿ Virally grow email subscribers & fans by offering your visitors $500 prizes for only $25. How? Incentivibe groups businesses so you can offer $500 prize on your website by sharing a fraction of prize cost (e.g. $25) with other businesses. ﻿ **Start Free Trial – Promo:** Get 20% off and Win $1,000 Facebook advertising. To enter contest, start the 14-day free trial before November 15th. See amazing Testimonials below. Set-up within seconds!﻿
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: gointerpay
module.description: Increase conversions with the GoInterpay international checkout solution. Includes local pricing, payment processing and international shipping with fully landed costs all in one module
module.description_full: Increase conversions with the GoInterpay international checkout solution. Includes local pricing, payment processing and international shipping with fully landed costs all in one module. All with no fraud risk to the merchant.
module.additional_description: With GoInterpay, your international shoppers will be able to shop and pay in their local currency, see guaranteed landed cost and pay with one of over 100 supported local payment methods -all fraud free.
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: alliance3
module.description: Alliance Processing is an experienced leader in High Risk global merchant transaction processing solutions onshore and off
module.description_full: Alliance Processing is an experienced leader in High Risk global merchant transaction processing solutions onshore and off. Our years of industry experience allow Alliance to offer unique processing relationships that merchants would not be able to access by going to the bank directly. We strive to be the preferred Credit Card and ACH Processing Provider for high risk eCommerce companies who look to expert advice and need more attractive solutions for any online business.
module.additional_description: In-house World Class Customer Support Dedicated account representative Free payment Gateway Onshore and off Shore solutions Same Day Approvals
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: giveit
module.description: Give.it displays a gifting button next your products. Let your customers purchase your products as gifts and send them to their friends via social media
module.description_full: Give.it displays a gifting button next your products. Let your customers purchase your products as gifts and send them to their friends via social media.
module.author: Prestashop
